title: Vibrant Emerald Cascade Haaram with Ruby Centerpiece
materials: Emerald accents. Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: Multi-strand Emerald bead configuration. Elaborate pendant design featuring traditional floral motifs and intricate filigree work. The pendant features a stunning rose-cut Ruby center stone, surrounded by Polki diamonds. Dangles of emerald beads are added for a touch of playfulness. Traditional Telugu craftsmanship is evident in the antique finish and setting style.
colors: and sparkling White (Diamonds). A harmonious combination of auspicious colors.
occasions: or grand festive celebrations. Can also be paired with modern attire for a touch of regal elegance.
description: This Haaram is a testament to timeless South Indian craftsmanship. The use of high-quality Emerald beads and a rare Rose Cut Ruby ensures exclusivity. The antique finish gives it a vintage charm, while the intricate design showcases skilled artisanry. It's a heirloom piece to be treasured for generations, representing prosperity and good fortune.
